static member GetMapping : Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Storage.IRelationalTypeMappingSource * string -> Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Storage.RelationalTypeMapping

Docs.param: The type to get the mapping for.
Docs.summary: Gets the mapping that represents the given database type, throwing if no mapping is found.
Docs.returns: The type mapping to be used.
Docs.remarks: Note that sometimes the same store type can have different mappings; this method returns the default.
